explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly discusses the application of machine learning (ML) models for forecasting and inventory management in SMEs.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper mentions the use of reinforcement learning approaches, specifically Q-learning and Deep Q Network (DQN), for inventory management.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper implements Support Vector Regression (SVR) as one of the ML models for forecasting purposes.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as part of the Support Vector Regression (SVR) model used in the research.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses Artificial Neural Network (ANN) and its variants (Wavelet-ANN) as part of the ML models for forecasting.
explanations.deep learning: The use of LSTM and its variants (Wavelet-LSTM) indicates the application of deep learning techniques in the research.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper implements Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) and Wavelet-LSTM (W-LSTM) models for forecasting purposes.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is explicitly mentioned as one of the models used in the research for forecasting.
